title: Carboxymethylcellulose encapsulated fingolimod, siRNA@ZnO hybrid nanocomposite as a new anti-Alzheimer's material
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22044-22055
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01965B, Paper

Nuha B. Aljohani, Safaa Y. Qusti, Madeeha Alsiny, Fadwa Aljoud, Norah Bakheet Aljohani, Eman S. Alsolami, Khalid A. Alamry, Mahmoud A. Hussein
CMC-encapsulated fingolimod and siRNA@ZnO hybrid nanocomposite frameworks have been proven to prevent AD and improve AD treatment techniques as drug delivery carriers.
